✱ NO DROPS OR OIL SHOULD BE PUT IN THE EAR
For wax in the ear:
✱  One or two drops of clean coconut oil should be put in each ear.
✱  One should not put any sharp or pointed object into the ear to clean it.
It is advisable to go to the health centre or hospital for cleaning of the ears.
Eyes
Redness of the eyes: This may be due to allergy or could be the beginning of an 
infection. If it is due to allergy, there is redness, itching and watering from the 
eyes. If infection is present, there is itching and discharge of pus from the eyes.
 
What to do:

108
Allergy in the eye:
✱  Eyes should be washed four times a day by splashing 
clean water. Hands should be washed with soap and 
water before doing this.
✱  One should take care not to rub the eyes.
✱  The health worker should be contacted for 
medicines.
Infection in the eye:
✱  Eyes should be washed as instructed above.
